an7.52:1.4: bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ → bhagavato santikā dhammiṃ kathaṃ (bj) | bhagavato dhammiṃ kathaṃ (s1-3) | bhagavato sammukhā dhammikathaṃ (pts1)
an7.52:4.1: sāpekho → sāpekkho (s1-3), patibaddhacitto → paṭibaddhacitto (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | patibandhacitto (mr)
an7.52:12.1: na heva → naheva kho (bj, s1-3, pts1)
